setting.name: Init Command
setting.description: Any values that need to be in the command line for initialising the XeTeX rendering engine.

setting.name: Use PDF Viewer
setting.description: Route the output to the PDF viewer.

setting.name: PDF Viewer Command
setting.description: The command needed to view the PDF output created by this module. The default is taken from the rapuma system configuration file.

setting.name: PDF Utility Command
setting.description: The primary command needed to do PDF file manipulations. Subsequent commands need to be added at the function level.

setting.name: Draft Background
setting.description: A list of backgounds to use for a draft version of a group.

setting.name: Proof Background
setting.description: A list of backgounds to use for a proof version of a group.

setting.name: Final Background
setting.description: A list of backgounds to use for a final version of a group. Normally there are none.

setting.name: Bind Background
setting.description: A list of backgounds to use for a bound final version of the publication. Normally there are none.
